duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and support Department of Defense (DoD) transportation projects, including analysis, planning, design, development, deployment, operations, and evaluation of highway, rail, transit, freight, aviation, and intermodal systems and services.
Manage projects to improve transportation safety, mobility, environment, and capabilities, finding creative solutions to unique transportation problems.
Mentor and supervise team members in a high tempo, high trust environment, conducting risk analysis and coordinating risk acceptance or waivers from appropriate authorities.
Develop and manage information technology systems and use analytical tools to display the impacts of various capability tradeoffs and impacts to potential alternatives.
Work with VIP or Special Air Mission requirements, perform risk analyses, propose risk mitigations, and have excellent verbal and written communication skills, including technical writing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Transportation Management, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
